data.comment: The first-half is just kicking off.
Nick Walsh awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 3, Free kick for Rangers in their own half.
Livingston have a dangerous throw-in.
Nick Walsh awards Rangers a goal kick.
In the minute 6, Throw-in Rangers.
Nick Walsh signals a Livingston throw-in in Rangers's half.
Livingston needs to be cautious. Rangers have an attacking throw-in.
In the minute 9, Throw-in for Livingston in their own half.
Free kick Rangers.
Throw-in for Rangers in the half of Livingston.
In the minute 11, Nick Walsh signals a throw-in for Rangers, close to Livingston's area.
Ryan Jack (Rangers) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Rangers have been awarded a corner by Nick Walsh.
In the minute 13, Rangers's Ryan Kent gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Livingston defender.
Rangers's Ianis Hagi gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Livingston have a goal kick.
In the minute 15, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Can Livingston capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Rangers's half?
Throw-in for Livingston close to the penalty box.
In the minute 17, Rangers to take a throw-in in Livingston territory.
Rangers awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Ball safe as Livingston is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 22, Ianis Hagi (Rangers) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
Throw-in high up the field for Rangers in Livingston.
Nick Walsh signals a free kick to Rangers.
In the minute 23, Throw-in for Livingston at Tony Macaroni Arena.
Can Livingston get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Rangers's half?
Rangers awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 27, It's a goal kick for the home team in Livingston.
In Livingston a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Rangers to take a throw-in in Livingston territory.
In the minute 30, In Livingston, Alfredo Morelos of Rangers is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
Livingston needs to be cautious. Rangers have an attacking throw-in.
Throw-in for Rangers at Tony Macaroni Arena.
In the minute 32, Throw-in for Rangers in their own half.
In Livingston Rangers attack through Alfredo Morelos. The finish is off target, however.
Ball goes out of play for a Livingston goal kick.
In the minute 34, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Goal kick for Livingston at Tony Macaroni Arena.
The match has been stopped briefly for attention to the injured Nicky Devlin.
In the minute 38, Nicky Devlin returns to the field for Livingston after picking up a slight injury.
Livingston awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Nick Walsh signals a free kick to Livingston in their own half.
In the minute 39, Free kick for Rangers in their own half.
Nick Walsh signals a free kick to Livingston in their own half.
Nick Walsh awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 42, Free kick for Rangers in the half of Livingston.
Rangers's Alfredo Morelos has run offside.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Livingston.
In the minute 45, 2 minutes of injury time will be added to the 1st half.
Corner awarded to Rangers.
Rangers surge into the attack at Tony Macaroni Arena but Filip Helanderâ€™s header is off-target.
In the minute 45, Goal kick for Livingston at Tony Macaroni Arena.
The first-half has come to a close in Livingston.
The second-half is underway in Livingston.
In the minute 46, Throw-in Rangers.
Livingston awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in for Livingston in the half of Rangers.
In the minute 49, Rangers have a goal kick.
Corner awarded to Rangers.
Ball goes out of play for a Livingston goal kick.
In the minute 52, Nick Walsh signals a Rangers throw-in in Livingston's half.
Ball safe as Livingston is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Can Livingston get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Rangers's half?
In the minute 54, Ryan Kent (Rangers) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Rangers's Alfredo Morelos breaks free at Tony Macaroni Arena. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Nick Walsh awards Livingston a goal kick.
In the minute 54, Play has been temporarily suspended for attention to Marvin Bartley for Livingston who is writhing in pain on the pitch.
Robbie Crawford (Livingston) has replaced the possibly injured Marvin Bartley.
Rangers have been awarded a corner by Nick Walsh.
In the minute 57, Throw-in for Rangers at Tony Macaroni Arena.
Matej Poplatnik is replacing Jack Hamilton for the home team.
The away team replace Scott Arfield with Brandon Barker.
In the minute 58, Steven Gerrard is making the team's first substitution at Tony Macaroni Arena with Kemar Roofe replacing Ianis Hagi.
Nick Walsh awards Livingston a goal kick.
Can Livingston get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Rangers's half?
In the minute 61, Throw-in for Rangers in their own half.
Corner awarded to Rangers.
Rangers awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 64, Rangers have been awarded a corner by Nick Walsh.
Nick Walsh signals a free kick to Livingston in their own half.
Alfredo Morelos (Rangers) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
In the minute 66, Nick Walsh awards the home team a throw-in.
Rangers have a goal kick.
Gary Holt (Livingston) is making a third substitution, with Scott Robinson replacing Alan Forrest.
In the minute 68, Rangers have been awarded a corner by Nick Walsh.
Rangers drive upfield and Connor Goldson gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Livingston defender.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Livingston.
In the minute 69, Rangers awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in Rangers.
Ball safe as Rangers is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 70, Rangers attack but Alfredo Morelos's header doesn't find the target.
Ball goes out of play for a Livingston goal kick.
Rangers make their third substitution with Cedric Itten replacing Alfredo Morelos.
In the minute 72, Throw-in for Rangers at Tony Macaroni Arena.
Ball safe as Livingston is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Throw-in Livingston.
In the minute 75, Free kick for Livingston in their own half.
Salim Kouider-Aissa is replacing Matej Poplatnik for Livingston at Tony Macaroni Arena.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 78, Nick Walsh signals a Livingston throw-in in Rangers's half.
Nick Walsh signals a free kick to Livingston.
Throw-in for Livingston in their own half.
In the minute 82, Nick Walsh signals a throw-in for Rangers, close to Livingston's area.
Livingston's Craig Sibbald is on target but unsuccessful.
Free kick Rangers.
In the minute 85, Rangers pushes forward through Borna Barisic, whose finish on goal is saved.
Corner awarded to Rangers.
Ryan Kent for Rangers gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
In the minute 85, Goal kick for Livingston at Tony Macaroni Arena.
Nick Walsh awards the away team a throw-in.
Brandon Barker (Rangers) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
In the minute 87, Corner awarded to Rangers.
Livingston awarded a free kick in their own half.
Goal kick for Livingston at Tony Macaroni Arena.
In the minute 89, Livingston to take a throw-in in Rangers territory.
Rangers awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Livingston's Scott Robinson gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Rangers have a goal kick.
5 minutes will be added to the 2nd half.
Throw-in Rangers.
Ryan Kent for Rangers gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Ball goes out of play for a Livingston goal kick.
Free kick for Rangers in their own half.
Rangers awarded a throw-in in their own half.
James Tavernier for Rangers drives towards goal at Tony Macaroni Arena. But the finish is unsuccessful.
Nick Walsh awards the away team a throw-in.
The second-half is over. The match ends 0-0.
